short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your WhatsApp Web chats private with Privacy Guard in any situation—at work, in public, or during screen sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your privacy on WhatsApp Web like never before with Privacy Guard for WhatsApp Web. This essential Chrome extension empowers you to keep your conversations private in any situation. Whether you’re at work, in a public place, or sharing your screen during a presentation, Privacy Guard ensures that your WhatsApp chats remain hidden from prying eyes.

Key Features:
1. Instant Privacy: Blur your WhatsApp Web chats with a single click to protect sensitive information from view.
2. Customizable Blurring: Easily choose which elements to blur and adjust the blur intensity to suit your needs.
3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive interface for quick and effortless privacy control.
4. Real-Time Protection: Apply blur effects instantly as you navigate through your chats, ensuring continuous privacy.
